price: 60. So Fir‘aun (Pharaoh) withdrew, devised his plot and then came back.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيۡدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: fatawallā fir'ʿawnu fajamaʿa kaydahu thumma atā
